templateName: Simple Aggregates Build Multiple Measures at Once

parameters.description: select a table from the data model
select a column from the data model. Column must come from the table that was selected earlier.

encoding.name: min of __columnName
encoding.description: calculates the minimum value from the __columnName column found in the __tableName table

encoding.name: max of __columnName
encoding.description: calculates the maximum value from the __columnName column found in the __tableName table

encoding.name: average of __columnName
encoding.description: calculates the average value from the __columnName column found in the __tableName table

encoding.name: sum of __columnName
encoding.description: calculates the sum value from the __columnName column found in the __tableName table

encoding.name: count of __columnName
encoding.description: counts the number of rows in the __columnName column found in the __tableName table

encoding.name: distinct count of __columnName
encoding.description: counts the number of distinct items in the __columnName column found in the __tableName table

instructions:
This template requires you to select the table and column name separately. 
1. Select a Table name from the data model
2. Select a name of a column ( its is important to select a column from the table that was previously selected. This will not work if the column is not in the selected table above in step 1 )

measures created in the Quick Dax Template will be placed in a folder named _Simple Aggregations.
description: creates six measures based on a single column. Measures are created for min, max, average, sum, count and distinct counts
